text: GRAMMAR - Yes/no questions with be (plural) = - A Questions: a Change the order of we / you / they and are: _ Sentence: We / You / They are at home. o Question: Are we / you / they at home? Positive answers: Yes, we / you / they are. (not Yes, youre / were / theyre.) Negative answers: No, you're / were / they're not. 120f26 No, we / you / they arentt. E
